t: Medium path PO skip, trivial lint, pre-integration check

tr: dept Leads run pre-integration readiness check before Integration Gate
ar: PO still runs for high-path tasks
full Integration Gate still runs after pre-check

obj: Implement T-6 (skip PO on medium path, saving ~2000 tokens), QR-4 (lightweight lint for trivial path), and CH-4 (pre-integration readiness check at dept Lead level to catch showstoppers before full Integration Gate).

a: Add po.skip_on_complexity array to defaults.json with default value ['medium','trivial']. This is separate from existing skip_on_effort which gates on effort level.
done: Config has skip_on_complexity key with medium and trivial defaults

a: Update go.md Path 0 medium_path routing to skip PO-Questionary loop when po.skip_on_complexity config array includes the classified complexity. Currently medium_path with PO runs abbreviated PO; change to skip entirely when config says so.
v: Read go.md medium_path section; confirm PO is skipped when skip_on_complexity includes medium
done: Medium-path tasks skip PO-Questionary loop when configured

a: Create scripts/trivial-lint.sh that runs lightweight checks on trivial-path tasks: shellcheck on .sh files (if available), jq --exit-status on .json files, basic markdown heading lint on .md files. Exit 0 on pass, exit 1 on fail with structured JSON output listing issues.
done: trivial-lint.sh runs lightweight automated checks on changed files

a: Create scripts/pre-integration-check.sh that dept Leads run before Integration Gate. Checks: all dept handoff sentinels exist, test-results.jsonl exists per dept, no open critical escalations in escalation.jsonl. Outputs JSON with ready/not-ready per department and blocking issues list.
v: bash scripts/pre-integration-check.sh --phase-dir .vbw-planning/phases/07-architecture-audit-optimization outputs valid JSON with per-dept status
done: pre-integration-check.sh validates dept readiness before full Integration Gate

a: Add BATS tests for trivial-lint.sh and pre-integration-check.sh.
v: bats tests/unit/trivial-lint.bats passes; bats tests/unit/pre-integration-check.bats passes
done: Tests verify trivial lint and pre-integration check behavior
